content:
On Tuesday night, Russian troops struck the city of Nikopol in the Dnipropetrovsk region from the Hurricane Oblan Fire.

About thisreportedHead of Dnipropetrovsk Regional State Administration Sergey Lisak.

“It was loud in Nikopol that night. The invaders hit the Hurricane RSSU. It has passed. There are no dead and victims, ”the message reads.

Sergiy Lisak added that in the rest of the cities and villages of Nikopol region, as well as in the Dnipropetrovsk region, without hostile attacks.

As reported by the Armyinform, during the night attack the enemyappliedCriminal tactics of striking drones over residential and industrial areas of Odessa and suburbs.
title: At night the Russians fired Nikopol from Hurricane
